#!/bin/bash
# backup.sh — daily backup of user home and MySQL databases

BACKUP_DIR="/backup"
DATE=$(date +%F)

# create backup directory if missing
mkdir -p "$BACKUP_DIR"

# 1) Archive user's home
tar czf "$BACKUP_DIR/${DATE}_home.tar.gz" /home/user

# 2) Dump all MySQL databases
DB_USER="backup"
DB_PASS="P@ssw0rd123"
mysqldump -u "$DB_USER" -p"$DB_PASS" --all-databases > "$BACKUP_DIR/${DATE}_db.sql"

# 3) Rotate old backups (keep last 7 days)
find "$BACKUP_DIR" -type f -mtime +7 -delete

echo "Backup ${DATE} completed successfully."
